CustomField.description: DO NOT enter extensions. Those go in the EXT field. For domestic numbers, formatting will apply automatically. For international numbers, start typing with a "+" and enter your own punctuation. For example: +49 8178 94 07-0.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: DO NOT enter extensions. Those go in the EXT field. For domestic numbers, formatting will apply automatically. For international numbers, start typing with a "+" and enter your own punctuation. For example: +49 8178 94 07-0.
